comment: The student correctly identifies the equation as the equality case of the Cauchy-Schwarz inequality, using a valid weighted inner product formulation. The derivation of the equality condition is correct. The student's subsequent analysis is thorough and accurate, correctly handling the general case where f(x) can be zero—a subtlety not addressed in the provided rubric. The final characterization of the solution set is flawless and demonstrates a deep understanding of the topic.
